verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, But <S%H539><s%>, behold, they will not believe me <S%H8085><s%>, nor listen unto my voice <S%H6963><s%>: for they will say <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not appeared unto you <S%H7200><s%>
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3027><s%>, What is that in your hand? And he said <S%H559><s%>, A rod <S%H4294><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Cast <S%H7993><s%> it on the ground <S%H776><s%>. And he cast <S%H7993><s%> it on the ground <S%H776><s%>, and it became a serpent <S%H5175><s%>; and Moses <S%H4872><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from before it <S%H6440><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Put forth <S%H7971><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and take <S%H270><s%> it by the tail <S%H2180><s%>. And he put forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and caught <S%H2388><s%> it <S%H4294><s%>, and it became a rod in his hand <S%H3709><s%>:

That they may believe <S%H539><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, has appeared unto you <S%H7200><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> furthermore <S%H5750><s%> unto him <S%H935><s%>, Put now your hand <S%H3027><s%> into your bosom <S%H2436><s%>. And he put <S%H935><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> into his bosom <S%H2436><s%>: and when he took <S%H3318><s%> it out <S%H3027><s%>, behold, his hand was leprous <S%H6879><s%> as snow <S%H7950><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Put <S%H7725><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> into your bosom <S%H2436><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>. And he put <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> into his bosom <S%H2436><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>; and plucked <S%H3318><s%> it out of his bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and <S%H7725><s%>, behold, it was turned again as his other flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H539><s%>, if they will not believe you neither listen <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> sign <S%H226><s%>, that they will believe <S%H539><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the latter <S%H314><s%> sign <S%H226><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H539><s%>, if they will not believe also these two <S%H8147><s%> signs <S%H226><s%>, neither listen <S%H8085><s%> unto your voice <S%H6963><s%>, that you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>, and pour <S%H8210><s%> it upon the dry <S%H3004><s%> land <S%H4325><s%>: and the water which you take <S%H3947><s%> out of the river <S%H2975><s%> shall become blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the dry land <S%H3006><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O <S%H994><s%> my Lord <S%H136><s%>, I <S%H376><s%> am not eloquent <S%H1697><s%>, neither before <S%H8032><s%>, nor since <S%H227><s%> you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto your servant <S%H5650><s%>: but I am slow <S%H3515><s%> of speech <S%H6310><s%>, and of a slow <S%H3515><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H7760><s%>, Who has made man <S%H120><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%>? or who makes <S%H7760><s%> the mute <S%H483><s%>, or deaf <S%H2795><s%>, or the seeing <S%H6493><s%>, or the blind <S%H5787><s%>? have not I the Lord <S%H3068><s%>?
Now therefore go <S%H3212><s%>, and I will be with your mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and teach <S%H3384><s%> you what you shall say <S%H1696><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, O <S%H994><s%> my Lord <S%H136><s%>, send <S%H7971><s%>, I pray you by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of him whom you will send <S%H7971><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%>, Is not Aaron <S%H175><s%> the Levite <S%H3881><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%>? I know <S%H3045><s%> that he can speak <S%H1696><s%> well <S%H1696><s%>. And also <S%H3318><s%>, behold, he comes forth to meet <S%H7125><s%> you and when he sees <S%H7200><s%> you he will be glad <S%H8055><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>.

And you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto him <S%H7760><s%>, and put words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth <S%H6310><s%>: and I will be with your mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and with his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and will teach <S%H3384><s%> you what you shall do <S%H6213><s%>.
And he shall be your spokesman <S%H1696><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>: and he shall be <S%H6310><s%>, even he shall be to you a mouth, and you shall be to him as God <S%H430><s%>.
And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> this rod <S%H4294><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%>, with which you shall do <S%H6213><s%> signs <S%H226><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jethro <S%H3500><s%> his father in law <S%H2859><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3212><s%>, Let me go, I pray you and return <S%H7725><s%> unto my brothers <S%H251><s%> which are in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> whether they be yet <S%H5750><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%>. And Jethro <S%H3503><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in Midian <S%H4080><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%>, return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: for all the men <S%H582><s%> are dead <S%H4191><s%> which sought <S%H1245><s%> your life <S%H5315><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and set <S%H7392><s%> them upon a donkey <S%H2543><s%>, and he returned <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, When you go <S%H3212><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, see <S%H7200><s%> that you do <S%H6213><s%> all those wonders <S%H4159><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, which I have put <S%H7760><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%>: but I will harden <S%H2388><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%>, that he shall not let the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>.
And you shall say <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%> is my son <S%H1121><s%>, even my firstborn <S%H1060><s%>:

And I say <S%H559><s%> unto you Let my son <S%H1121><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, that he may serve <S%H5647><s%> me <S%H3985><s%>: and if you refuse to let him go <S%H7971><s%>, behold <S%H2026><s%>, I will kill your son <S%H1121><s%>, even your firstborn <S%H1060><s%>.
And it came to pass by the way <S%H1870><s%> in the inn <S%H4411><s%>, that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> met <S%H6298><s%> him <S%H1245><s%>, and sought to kill him <S%H4191><s%>.

Then Zipporah <S%H6855><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a sharp stone <S%H6864><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> the foreskin <S%H6190><s%> of her son <S%H1121><s%>, and cast <S%H5060><s%> it at his feet <S%H7272><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Surely a bloody <S%H1818><s%> husband are you to me <S%H2860><s%>.
So he let him go <S%H7503><s%>: then she said <S%H559><s%>, A bloody <S%H1818><s%> husband <S%H2860><s%> you are because of the circumcision <S%H4139><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>. And he went <S%H3212><s%>, and met <S%H6298><s%> him in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, and kissed him <S%H5401><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who had sent <S%H7971><s%> him <S%H226><s%>, and all the signs which he had commanded him <S%H6680><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and gathered together <S%H622><s%> all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> believed <S%H539><s%>: and when they heard <S%H8085><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had visited <S%H6485><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and that he had looked <S%H7200><s%> upon their affliction <S%H6040><s%>, then they bowed their heads <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%>.
